sources.name: StagingRefDataPaymentType
sources.description: Import data from staging in CSV format

sources.name: StagingRefDataTaxiZone
sources.description: Import data from staging in CSV format

sources.name: StagingRefDataTripType
sources.description: Import data from staging in CSV format

sources.name: StagingRefDataVendor
sources.description: Import data from staging in CSV format

sinks.name: RawRefDataPaymentType
sinks.description: Export csv to parquet as single file (small data)

sinks.name: RawRefDataTaxiZone
sinks.description: Export csv to parquet as single file (small data)

sinks.name: RawRefDataTripMonth
sinks.description: Export csv to parquet as single file (small data)

sinks.name: RawRefDataTripType
sinks.description: Export csv to parquet as single file (small data)

sinks.name: RawRefDataVendor
sinks.description: Export csv to parquet as single file (small data)

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		payment_type as short,
		abbreviation as string,
		description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> StagingRefDataPaymentType
source(output(
		LocationID as string,
		Borough as string,
		Zone as string,
		service_zone as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> StagingRefDataTaxiZone
source(output(
		Trip_Month as string,
		Month_Name_Short as string,
		Month_Name_Full as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> StagingRefDataTripMonth
source(output(
		trip_type as string,
		description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> StagingRefDataTripType
source(output(
		vendor_id as short,
		abbreviation as string,
		description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> StagingRefDataVendor
source(output(
		rate_code_id as short,
		description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> StagingRefDataRateCode
StagingRefDataPaymentType sink(input(
		payment_type as short,
		abbreviation as string,
		description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[''],
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> RawRefDataPaymentType
StagingRefDataRateCode sink(input(
		rate_code_id as short,
		description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[''],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> RawRefDataRateCode
StagingRefDataTaxiZone sink(input(
		LocationID as string,
		Borough as string,
		Zone as string,
		service_zone as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[''],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> RawRefDataTaxiZone
StagingRefDataTripMonth sink(input(
		Trip_Month as string,
		Month_Name_Short as string,
		Month_Name_Full as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[''],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> RawRefDataTripMonth
StagingRefDataTripType sink(input(
		trip_type as string,
		description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[''],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> RawRefDataTripType
StagingRefDataVendor sink(input(
		vendor_id as short,
		abbreviation as string,
		description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[''],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> RawRefDataVendor
